statements: SELECT * FROM music_genres WHERE genre_id = 1;
SELECT genre_name, popularity_score FROM music_genres WHERE genre_name = 'Rock';
SELECT genre_id, genre_name, popularity_score FROM music_genres ORDER BY popularity_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM music_genres WHERE popularity_score > 0.8;
SELECT genre_id, genre_name FROM music_genres WHERE popularity_score < 0.5;
SELECT * FROM music_genres ORDER BY genre_name DESC, popularity_score ASC
SELECT genre_name, popularity_score FROM music_genres WHERE popularity_score > 0.5
SELECT genre_name, popularity_score FROM music_genres WHERE genre_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM music_genres WHERE genre_name LIKE '%rock%'
SELECT genre_name, AVG(popularity_score) AS avg_popularity FROM music_genres GROUP BY genre_name HAVING avg_popularity > 0.4
SELECT * FROM music_genres;
SELECT genre_name FROM music_genres WHERE genre_id = '9469a460-5517-4fe6-aa17-388d939fb9a1';
SELECT genre_id, genre_name FROM music_genres ORDER BY genre_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM streaming_data WHERE num_streams > 1000;
SELECT genre_id, COUNT(stream_id) AS total_streams FROM streaming_data GROUP BY genre_id HAVING total_streams > 5000;
SELECT * FROM music_genres WHERE genre_name = 'Pop';
SELECT stream_id, timestamp, num_streams FROM streaming_data WHERE num_streams > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT genre_id, COUNT(stream_id) AS stream_count FROM streaming_data GROUP BY genre_id HAVING COUNT(stream_id) > 10 ORDER BY stream_count DESC;
SELECT genre_name, num_streams FROM music_genres JOIN streaming_data ON music_genres.genre_id = streaming_data.genre_id WHERE num_streams BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT genre_id, MAX(num_streams) AS max_streams FROM streaming_data GROUP BY genre_id HAVING MAX(num_streams) > 500 ORDER BY max_streams DESC;
SELECT * FROM genre WHERE genre_id = 1
SELECT artist_name FROM artist ORDER BY artist_id DESC
SELECT genre_name, artist_name FROM genre JOIN artist ON genre.genre_id = artist.genre_id
SELECT * FROM streaming_data WHERE streams > 1000
SELECT artist_id, streaming_date FROM streaming_data ORDER BY streaming_date
SELECT * FROM genre WHERE genre_id = 1
SELECT artist_name, genre_name FROM artist INNER JOIN genre ON artist.genre_id = genre.genre_id
SELECT artist_name, SUM(streams) AS total_streams FROM artist INNER JOIN streaming_data ON artist.artist_id = streaming_data.artist_id GROUP BY artist_name
SELECT artist_name, streaming_date, streams FROM artist INNER JOIN streaming_data ON artist.artist_id = streaming_data.artist_id WHERE streams > 1000 ORDER BY streams DESC, streaming_date

SELECT genre_name, AVG(streams) AS avg_streams FROM artist INNER JOIN streaming_data ON artist.artist_id = streaming_data.artist_id INNER JOIN genre ON artist.genre_id = genre.genre_id GROUP BY genre_name
SELECT * FROM Genre
SELECT genre_name FROM Genre
SELECT artist_name, genre_name FROM Artist INNER JOIN Genre ON Artist.genre_id = Genre.genre_id
SELECT album_name, release_date FROM Album ORDER BY release_date DESC
SELECT song_name, play_count FROM Song WHERE play_count > 1000
SELECT artist_name, genre_name FROM Artist INNER JOIN Genre ON Artist.genre_id = Genre.genre_id
SELECT song_name, play_count, release_year FROM Song WHERE play_count > 100 ORDER BY release_year DESC
SELECT genre_name, COUNT(*) AS total_artists FROM Genre INNER JOIN Artist ON Genre.genre_id = Artist.genre_id GROUP BY genre_name
SELECT album_name, release_date, artist_name FROM Album INNER JOIN Artist ON Album.artist_id = Artist.artist_id ORDER BY release_date ASC
SELECT * FROM Song WHERE release_year BETWEEN 2000 AND 2020
SELECT * FROM Genre ORDER BY genre_name DESC;
SELECT artist_name, genre_id FROM Artist WHERE artist_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT album_title, release_date FROM Album ORDER BY release_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT song_title, duration FROM Song WHERE duration > 180;
SELECT stream_date, number_of_streams FROM StreamData WHERE number_of_streams > 1000 ORDER BY stream_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Genre;
SELECT artist_name, genre_name FROM Artist JOIN Genre ON Artist.genre_id = Genre.id;
SELECT album_title, release_date, artist_name FROM Album JOIN Artist ON Album.artist_id = Artist.id;
SELECT song_title, duration, album_title FROM Song JOIN Album ON Song.album_id = Album.id;
SELECT stream_date, song_title, number_of_streams FROM StreamData JOIN Song ON StreamData.song_id = Song.id;
